Html:
I read a large amount of lat long points (=-3500) from a file and add them to the map.
This goes quite fast, although it still takes several seconds, so if anyone knows how to speed up this process that would be great.
What I already do: model.GMapView.HoldInvalidation = true;
and only refresh after all markers have been added.

The second issue is that after adding all those markers the mapcontrol get's quite slow.
I mean that it start's to "lag".
Are there any tweaks that could keep the map responsive?
I already use: ServerAndCache mode, BoostCacheEngine and CacheOnIdleRead

Thank you
you can iterate via points ant skip the point if the distance from the last point is too little

the problem is that every point represents a picture taken on-site. So I need every marker.

edit: problem is fixed, I used to add duplicates to the map. This proves that the map easily supports 3500 markers.
Thanks again!
